item.description:
This is the first in a multi-part series where I will teach you to develop an application from scratch using CakePHP. You will be amazed how fast you can develop apps with this framework.

NOTICE: Location has changed!

RSVP Now - this will fill-up fast!

If you don't already use a PHP framework then this is for you. CakePHP is one of the more popular frameworks and is similar to RubyOnRails.

I will start you off at the very beginning as though you know nothing about CakePHP. Bring your laptops and your enthusiasm to learn something new. You wont want to miss this:

Outline:

  • Why a PHP framework
  • Basics of MVC (Model, View, Controller)
  • Installing CakePHP
  • Documentation review
  • Design simple task management app
  • Designing the Database
  • Baking the app
  • Re-factoring the app for our own specific business logic
  • What's next

I promise to keep this simple and easy to follow. If your a beginner with Frameworks then please make sure to RSVP. Note that we plan to do other frameworks later in the year. If you've been curious about frameworks, then you will want to attend these as well.
